question: What insights can be drawn from the recent social media activity of data leadership at companies that have invested in cybersecurity technologies?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have invested in cybersecurity technologies. [CompanyVendorTechDetail]
Identify the data leadership personas at these companies. [PersonaUser]
Gather the social media activity (LinkedIn) from these leadership personas. [PersonaLinkedinActivity]
Analyze the insights from social media activity in relation to their company's investment in cybersecurity. [PersonaLinkedinActivity, CompanyVendorTechDetail]
